data.title: Splitsville for Russell Crowe, Danielle Spencer?
data.meta_description: Actor Russell Crowe and his wife Danielle Spencer have reportedly separated after nine years of marriage.
data.text:
The couple, who first met 22 years ago on the set of the movie The Crossing, married in April 2003.

London: Actor Russell Crowe and his wife Danielle Spencer have reportedly separated after nine years of marriage.

The couple's split comes after rumors of Spencer's romance with dancer Damian Whitewood, reports people.com.

In June, Spencer was spotted at a Sydney casino lounge with Whitewood, her dance partner on season 12 of Australia's Dancing with the Stars.

The photos showed the two with their arms around each other.

Spencer is currently in Sydney with their sons - 8-and-half-year-old Charles, and Tennyson, 6 - while Crowe is in New York where he performed at the Gramercy Theatre Saturday night.

The couple, who first met 22 years ago on the set of the movie The Crossing, married in April 2003.
